channel.title: [508] Player Option Help [508]

item.title: [508] Player Option Help [508]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Why is it when this code is implemented:

if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) {
	    	p.frames.setPlayerOption(p, "Attack", 1);
	} else {

	}
	p.frames.setPlayerOption(p, "Trade", 2);
p.frames.setPlayerOption(p, "Follow", 3);
	p.frames.setPlayerOption(p, "Challenge", 4);

That the “Trade” option after like 10 seconds in-game, turns into a “follow”? This makes 2 “follows”…

Any ideas?

Read full topic
